name: @devmattic/orbly
description: Tailwind-first blended custom blob cursor with magnetic hover.

scripts.release:dry: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && npm pack --dry-run
scripts.release: standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish --access public
scripts.demo: npm run build && serve -l 5173 . && open http://localhost:5173/demo/
